title: Honoring Lori E. Horowitz Moran, Esq. upon the occasion of being inducted into the John F. Kennedy High School Hall of Fame
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring  Lori E. Horowitz Moran, Esq. upon the
occasion of being inducted into the John F. Kennedy High School Hall  of
Fame

WHEREAS, It is the practice of this Legislative Body to take note of and
publicly  acknowledge  individuals of remarkable integrity and character
who have inspired and brought pride to our majestic  Empire  State  with
their strong contributions to the community and model citizenship; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to honor Lori
E. Horowitz Moran upon the occasion of being inducted into the  John  F.
Kennedy  High School Hall of Fame; to celebrate this auspicious event, a
Hall of Fame Induction Ceremony and Dinner was held at the  high  school
on Saturday, November 13, 2010; and
  WHEREAS, Lori E. Horowitz Moran graduated in 1979 from John F. Kennedy
High  School,  which  is  located  in  the Bellmore-Merrick Central High
School District; and
  WHEREAS, She  then  graduated  from  Hofstra  University  and  Hofstra
University  School of Law; at the age of 22, she was admitted to the New
York State Bar Association; and
  WHEREAS, In addition to practicing  law,  Attorney  Lori  E.  Horowitz
Moran  has held numerous county positions such as: Chief Counsel, Nassau
County Board of Supervisors; Chief Prosecutor for  Child  Abuse,  Nassau
County;  Bureau Chief, Nassau County Department of Real Estate; Chief of
Operations for a Nassau County Executive, and Chief Operating Officer of
a Private Management Company; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body that  when  individ-
uals  of  such  noble aims and accomplishments are brought to our atten-
tion, they should be celebrated and recognized by all  the  citizens  of
this great Empire State; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
honor Lori E. Horowitz Moran upon the occasion of  being  inducted  into
the John F. Kennedy High School Hall of Fame; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted  to  Lori  E. Horowitz Moran, Esq., 2921 Judith Drive, Bellmore,
New York 11710.
